title: Beverly Holistic Health
cleaned_text: Providing Holistic Healthcare services on the North Shore since 1998 Acupuncture is a medical system that has diagnosed, treated, and prevented illness for more than 2,300 years. Acupuncture is used to treat disease and improve general health as well as enhance the immune system, restore the body's recuperative powers, and improve brain and emotional health. It is a safe and effective method for treating a wide variety of conditions and can provide rapid results. Massage Therapy should be an integral part of your health-maintenance routine. Massage can help keep your muscles toned, prevent and treat injury, relieve stress, and provide a meditative space to retreat from a hectic life. Our professional therapists will tailor your massage to address your personal needs.
